data.comment: The match has started at Allianz Field.
Chicago have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Victor Rivas signals a Minnesota throw-in in Chicago's half.
Important block from the Chicago defence as Robin Lod fires in a strike for Minnesota.
Victor Rivas awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 12, Chicago's Alvaro Medran breaks free at Allianz Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 13, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Minnesota push forward at Allianz Field and Robin Lod gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chicago defence.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 14, In Saint Paul, Jose Aja (Minnesota) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Kei Kamara gets his shot on target but fails to score for Minnesota.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 15, Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Chicago's Robert Beric scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 17, Great play from Przemyslaw Frankowski to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gaston Gimenez of Chicago smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 20, Chicago are pushing forward but Djordje Mihailovic's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Francisco Calvo (Chicago) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 24, Minnesota's Jan Gregus gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago's Robert Beric gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
Fabian Herbers (Chicago) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 31, Kei Kamara (Minnesota) strikes at Allianz Field but his header is cleared.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Allianz Field, Chicago are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 33, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Victor Rivas awards Chicago a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Free kick Chicago.
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Minnesota's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Chicago in Saint Paul.
In the minute 37, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Minnesota pushes forward through Ethan Finlay, whose finish on goal is saved.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Chicago in the half of Minnesota.
Bakaye Dibassy for Minnesota has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
The match at Allianz Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Przemyslaw Frankowski, who is down injured.
In the minute 43, Przemyslaw Frankowski returns to the field for Chicago after picking up a slight injury.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Victor Rivas blows against Minnesota's Kei Kamara for offside.
In the minute 45, Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Saint Paul.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 45, Kei Kamara (Minnesota) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Allianz Field.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Kei Kamara (Minnesota) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 51, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Chicago.
Goal! Mauricio Pineda extends Chicago's lead to 0-2.
In Saint Paul, Boris Sekulic of Chicago is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Chicago.
Victor Rivas signals a Chicago throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in Chicago.
Chicago are coming forward and Przemyslaw Frankowski gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 59, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Marlon Hairston of Minnesota gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 60, Minnesota make their first substitution with Aaron Schoenfeld replacing Kei Kamara.
The home team have replaced Ethan Finlay with Emanuel Reynoso. This is the second substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
Minnesota's Robin Lod misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Chicago at Allianz Field.
Victor Rivas awards Chicago a goal kick.
Minnesota drive upfield and Kevin Molino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chicago defender.
In the minute 63, Minnesota's Emanuel Reynoso is on target but unsuccessful.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Jose Aja pulls one back for Minnesota to make it 1-2.
In the minute 64, That's a fine assist from Emanuel Reynoso.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Mauricio Pineda is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Mauricio Pineda is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 70, The away team replace Fabian Herbers with Elliot Collier.
Ignacio Aliseda is on a sub for Djordje Mihailovic for Chicago.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 72, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Chicago's Elliot Collier misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Minnesota have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 77, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 78, Chicago's Ignacio Aliseda has been booked in Saint Paul.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
In Saint Paul Minnesota attack through Marlon Hairston. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Goal! Robin Lod (Minnesota) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Saint Paul.
Romain Metanire instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 82, Chicago drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Victor Rivas awards Chicago a goal kick.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 84, Chicago are pushing forward but Robert Beric's finish is wide of the goal.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marlon Hairston.
Chicago's Elliot Collier is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, James Musa is replacing Marlon Hairston for the home team.
Raphael Wicky (Chicago) is making a third substitution, with Miguel Navarro replacing Jonathan Bornstein.
In the minute 87, Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Minnesota are coming forward and Emanuel Reynoso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
In the minute 88, Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago drives forward and Alvaro Medran gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Chicago are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Chicago.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
At Allianz Field, Jose Aja has been yellow-carded for the home team.
